website_summaries.verdict: Desirable price for an attic fan that has a big solar panel to generate 40 watts of power.
pros: Runs quietly, so it's great for use in an RV or a workshop in a garage
Has enough power that it can generate the airflow needed to remove moisture from the attic area
Fan housing has less bulk than some other units
cons: Only a 14-inch fan with very small blades, so it is not made for big jobs

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan of this fan
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a 160 sq. ft. home greenhouse to provide cooling and move the air a bit. We haven't hit the scalding temps expected this summer but so far the fan and panel have performed admirably. We installed the panel on a portable board that we can turn toward the sun when we are around. It is very sensitive and the slightest shadow will slow the fan considerably. Works great and moves air when the sun shines and we are very happy with the entire unit. Our tiny plants are happy as well and we look forward to a bountiful tomato year.
customer_reviews.author: UP Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for my little shed
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this fan. I didn't have any issues at all installing it into my little shed. I set it to pull the hot air out as shown in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Morrand

customer_reviews.title: Moves air!
customer_reviews.text: Liked: Moves air! This fan has decent power during full sun. I can hear it whirring away standing under my gable vent outside. Only minor gripe was I had to splice in another 20' of wire to make it to my desired panel location. I also spent a while fabricating brackets due to a tricky tight location I picked. I think a simpler way would be to use long bolts with some sort of a sleeve tube (small pvc?) to hold the unit off the roofing, but I had some aluminum angle in the garage....
customer_reviews.author: G. F. Construction

customer_reviews.title: Go for it.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, and in good shape. No issues at this time. I would suggest a better instruction sheet for those that are challenged using a screwdriver. Oh, one more thing, even though it doesn't matter if you check the rotation. The colors of the wiring are opposite of what they should be, or at least mine were. No biggie though. I have spoke with Amtrak Solar. They are easy to get in touch with and very nice. Great customer sevice.
customer_reviews.author: R. U. Sure

customer_reviews.title: Does not do the job.
customer_reviews.text: I installed it in a 550 sq. ft. attic and it does not seem to do much to lower the temp. I suggest a 110 fan which is much stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to fix a few things
customer_reviews.text: Went to install this but the holes in the mounting brackets dont match the bolts they send. Finally got it mounted in a 120 degree attic and found out the fan blade is loose and making a horrible load noise. Back up in the attic to pull it off the wall to fix it do yourself a favor and buy somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Randymoen

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: We are building a new home and wanted to put in the garage to pull hot air out in summer. We set it up and it works like a charm. Pulls just enough air to cools things off. UPDATE: We received this fan and panel...enclosed with this unit was a letter stating that if you left a review and sent an email to the address listed from seller, then you would receive a thermostat control. We sent email and posted a review but no thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: R. Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Underpowered
customer_reviews.text: The installation was pretty easy, just took a few cuts of wood and some screws. The wiring was backward, which initially had my fan spinning the wrong way. The blue wire crimps/connectors all broke after one attach/disconnect. So that was pretty annoying. Based on the information provided, I ordered the 20 watt rig for a small 8' x 12' greenhouse. The fan spins but seems underpowered and hardly moves any air, I have to put my hand up to it or stand super still under it for a bit to even feel it. So far it's pretty disappointing, I wish sellers would accurately describe their products.
customer_reviews.author: lbj is dead

customer_reviews.title: Keeps shed cool
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install if you are even a little handy. I installed by myself in a few hours. The majority of the time was framing out around the vent in the shed wall. Fan runs great when the sun hits it on the shed roof. Keeps the temp down to what it feels like outside the shed. Before it would get wicked hot in the shed. It is kinda loud within about 10ft of the shed. Only drawback, that I just realized, is that it run in winter. I know there is a thermostat available but I think I'll be adding a switch.
customer_reviews.author: DanburyBowhunter

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have good sunlight.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to vent my attic in a 500 sqft house. It does a great job. The attic has vents on both sides and two on the eaves. No ridge vents. Moisture was becoming an issue in the attic. It’s been installed about 6 weeks. The fan is starting to make a sound like a bad bearing. I will have to investigate this and update later. The fan works great, shade and clouds really affect the voltage output of the solar panel. I used some flexible conduit to protect the wires from UV damage. I’m leaving this at 5 stars even with the squeaking noise that has started.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Wright

customer_reviews.title: Stands behind his product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in January. It was easy to install and worked well. This week it started making a loud noise. I contacted the company. The phone was answered immediately. Steps were given to lubricate the shaft. Two days later it died. I contacted the company again. The new motor and upgraded blade are in the mail the same day. I will see how long the new unit lasts but the company customer philosophy is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Tom California

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this not for an attic but to circulate air in a open horse shed. I having zero knowledge did managed to get this fan up and going with a ton of help from the owner of Amtrak. He was very helpful, answered all of my questions immediately, kind of shocking. I would definitely recommend Amtrak. Could you figure out how to use solar power to keep open water tanks from freezing?
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy so far ...
customer_reviews.text: Am super happy with this fan. At first, it didn’t seem to help, but I realized my gable vent openings were very small and restricted air. Once I removed that, the fan cooled my work shed by probably 30F . New gable vent with bigger slits ordered. I will update review once we get some rain and I see how it manages that.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Krotzer

customer_reviews.title: Poor solar power or very low current for the size of the fan
customer_reviews.text: A 40w solar panel can run the 80w fan only in a sunlight and not powerful enough to move any air. Attic fans are made to work nonstop during the daytime therefore lack of sufficient current can make the fan not working under normal daylight or in s sunlight. I have the 3 stars for the fan construction which I think is strong enough to last long.
customer_reviews.author: S-M-and-II

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it at delivery
customer_reviews.text: Just received today. I messaged seller immediately after ordering to add the larger fan blade (not installed yet; black plastic in pic) and the thermostat (it is a snap switch you add in line) both were sent along with my purchase. It’s very quiet with the original metal blade and I’m excited to install in my attic! I am pleased with what I got so far.
customer_reviews.author: Val D.

customer_reviews.title: panel and fan power don't match, panel is trash
customer_reviews.text: Part of this kit is trash, they sent a 40w solar panel and an 80w fan, why not send panel and fan with equal power. The solar panel will not charge if the sun isn't beaming on it, forget the fan running on fully cloudy days. And while I am using it in a 300 sq ft greenhouse, I am thoroughly disappointed with the kit. The fan has quite a bit of power and works well when u run it off a battery, the solar panel is absolutely trash and not reliable at all. Would not recommend this if u are looking to move air reliably and constantly during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sarah Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service...But Expensive and Poor Product Performance
customer_reviews.text: We have a small 8 x 16 greenhouse and this little fan tried but just could not keep temps below 100 degrees. When temps finally reached 110+, we caved and bought a real ventilation fan from Greenhouse Megastore. This is not a good fan for a greenhouse. That being said, customer service was fantastic. Fan might work in other situations like an attic or RV, but if you are looking to cool or circulate air in a greenhouse, look elsewhere and save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Foxy

customer_reviews.title: Attic ventilation and cooling
customer_reviews.text: This unit works very well, just as described. I had two attic gable vents installed to let hot air out but it needed to be pulled out by a fan. This solar unit works great is easy yo install and you don't need to call an electrician for wiring. I got the 85 degree thermostat with it and it works great together with the fan. Will only come on when attic temp is 85 degrees or greater. Great product and marvelous idea!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Trying to save money!!! Give this a shot.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this set up, the price is great. I was going to use an electric fan but that sort of defeats the purpose of trying to save money by putting the fan in. This is just a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bullington

customer_reviews.title: Easy performance
customer_reviews.text: I put mine in my attic to blow the hot air out the gable vents. Works the second the sun hits the panel. Quiet yet seems to be moving quite a bit of air at full sun. I would give 5 stars but will wait to see if the unit is dependable. The worst part of the job is crawling across attic joists at my age to get to the vent. Piece of cake after that.
customer_reviews.author: Dober

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Super easy to install, quite powerful. Installed on an enclosed porch to push heat into the house. Just need a thermostat for it! Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Solar Powered Fan for Green House
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is great and recommended the 40 watt fan for my 6x6x7 green house. It works as described and is easy to assemble. They also sent me a thermostat to connect to the fan/solar panel which I requested. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute waste of money. Steer clear
customer_reviews.text: Fans work great, solar panels don’t put any power off at all. Horrible product
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lafleur

customer_reviews.title: Direct sunlight
customer_reviews.text: It’s a straight fwd install. Runs well as long as its in direct sunlight so be wise on where you install your solar panel. Try to grab as much sun as you can and the later you can. Overall would recomend. Makes a noticeable difference for sure
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Solar Fan works well for shed.
customer_reviews.text: Got this solar fan and thermostat for my shed. Works well, keeps the inside air moving and reasonable temperature for Southern Alabama. Great alternative to running power line to a detached shed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my chickens cool!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up...and it def keeps my chickens cool. Can set for only on 85 degrees and up, or on all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Pinkadot

customer_reviews.title: Good additional vent
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for rv shed. Already had a couple of vents at bottom of walls, needed some more ventilation so added this to top of wall and worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Toady

customer_reviews.title: Attic exhaust fan
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to install and has made a very pronounced difference in our house temperature. I highly recommend this product to anyone wishing to utilize this product.
customer_reviews.author: Health Nut

customer_reviews.title: This fan fails to move air
customer_reviews.text: The good news is the fan runs well with the panels, the bad news is the fan moves almost no air! It seems that the housing is too big and the fan blades just don't push air even though they are spinning quite fast. I have it mounted in a small green house and when the breeze is blowing into the fan, the air moves the air backwards through the fan. I would return it if I could, as it is totally ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: Obiwon1

customer_reviews.title: Great for the greenhouse
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my greenhouse. Installed it with a gable vent. When sun comes out can goes on. Removes lots of hot air. If this holds up for a couple of years it will be worth the money
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Bad value, lasted less than one year
customer_reviews.text: We bought this fan last year, and felt that it worked. Less than one year later, it doesn’t work. We checked the motor, and it’s dead. This was a lot of money to spend for less than one years use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. W.

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative
customer_reviews.text: Had my doubts, but it works really well for the price. Fan blades needed a little straightening out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Bronson Cheeks

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product horrible company
customer_reviews.text: Horrible company horrible product. He asked for an American made product and when you get it it says made in Taiwan. Then the unit doesn’t work. Then a company emails you pretty much tells you an idiot because you can’t connect to wires. Then you send it back for a refund. Then they tell you that you damaged it and they don’t give you all your money back. Even though when you put it back in the box there was no damage whatsoever. They do not care about customer service bad company just trying to steal money
customer_reviews.author: richard f.

customer_reviews.title: Need to refigure your wires for more stability
customer_reviews.text: My husband install this in the attic and the panel on the roof. He had lots of issues with the panel. Everyone of the wires pulled out of the four plus. He had to reword everyone of them. Very poorly put together. What should have taken 30 minutes to install, took him well over an hour. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for a newly built greenhouse. It arrived on time and was everything I expected. Easy to install. Called for free thermostat and you sent right out. I have received that also and installed and am happy to report that it Is keeping my greenhouse from overheating during the day. Thanks for a great product. I may order another one for additional venting in the greenhouse if need be as temps rise.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This seems a good little solar fan. Although, the cord between the panel and fan motor could use a doubling in length for my application. At the moment, I cannot get enough direct sunlight to run most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Nice little unit which works as described. There is no battery so the panel needs to be in complete full sun for the fan to spin.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one and everything worked great. I like it. So i ordered another and it had bad wire ends as if it had been retuened. Seller was pro about product refund on the second. I am giving a 3 because of my mixed experience. OK.
customer_reviews.author: guitarmike82

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Cheap made. Fan blades are not balances. Wobble, wobble. J-U-N-K. Not powerful, even for a solar motor. It's weak. Should have just rolled to car window down and let my $189.95 + 19.95 (Thermostat) blow away. Just a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Roger E.

customer_reviews.title: Small fan
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, the fan is only 9" in a 11.5" duct which needs to be in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F Spaniola

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my small greenhouse
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this solar fan and panel for my greenhouse. Very easy instalation and it works perfectly. I also bought the in line thermostat which turns on at 85 degrees. The unit is as described in the add and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Very weak/slow fan... not enough for a 900sq/ft home attic for sure
customer_reviews.text: The vendor accepted the returned product, so I feel bad for "knocking" them with a low review; the only reason I didn't go lower is because I have to accept some of the responsibility for not researching what I really needed.
customer_reviews.author: James Sander

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I tested it before I put it up so no surprises. Took twenty minutes to install the fan and panel and hopefully this will be the last one I have to buy
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fan works well , easy to install , doesn't break the bank , only problem was that in the ad it says "free thermostat". mine arrived without the thermostat. Had to call Amazon who gave me the company info . and the company mailed me the thermostat. Apparently others had the same issue , judging by the reviews . Make sure you get your thermostat , and Hey Amazon , maybe the advertisement needs to be reviewed .
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Fan is made of plastic, nothing like photo
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on the r views I read. This is what I learned -fan is made of plastic! I thought it would be made of metal (as seen in photos). -not very strong. I installed this in a window opening and the breeze cannot be felt further than approx. 3 feet away. (Keep in mind it is receiving full sun exposure) I purchased this for a 12x24 greenhouse. I would not recommend or purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: robert martinez

customer_reviews.title: An easy upgrade that pays for itself.
customer_reviews.text: The product idea is great in that it moves out hot air from my garage attic in a quiet and cost-free manner. I realize that I would have to do a little bit of carpentry to make it just right to fit my needs but that's the life of a DIYer. With the addition of attic insulation my garage is now a comfortable place.
customer_reviews.author: Gemo

customer_reviews.title: Came as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged in 3 boxes plus padding material... Worked right out of the box.. The fan shroud was not perfectly round, but no issue... Speed depends on sunlight... It works for my application..
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, use it to keep my green house cool in the spring summer time, great product
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Solar greenhouse vent fan
customer_reviews.text: Installed this fan in my newly built greenhouse. It worked immediately and the installation was easy. We will see how heat dissipation goes for the rest of the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M.

customer_reviews.title: And speaking of speed the fan makes horrible buzzing sound because they used high speed small fan
customer_reviews.text: Panel is so cheap monocrystalline that one finger shadow reduced fan speed by 50%. One finger... And speaking of speed the fan makes horrible buzzing sound because they used high speed small fan??? I've put better quality panels on house as array and dust was not a problem but this panel collects it like going out of business. Save your money and buy something better. Give it two stars for saving time to put together my own design, but will not buy from this company again. Not sure I'll even keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Easy, lightweight instillation in my Greenhouse.
customer_reviews.text: Exhaust fan for small greenhouse. Works immediately when the sun hits it in the morning. Light-weight solar panel attached to greenhouse roof easily with zip-ties. Fan is quiet and moves a good amount of air
customer_reviews.author: Lynn W

customer_reviews.title: no thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Would be great if i got a thermostat as described...
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Moves hot air out of green house
customer_reviews.text: Purchased of greenhouse 6x8 Works great to move hot air out
customer_reviews.author: Jesus R. Gancedo

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: It works- for a few days at least. Fan blades sheared off the motor with no way to reattach so it’s pretty useless now. Update: they replaced the broken fan and everything seems a-ok now
customer_reviews.author: Sherrell Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. We are using it to provide a breeze ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We are using it to provide a breeze for our dogs in their kennel. I installed the solar panel on the wood framework of the roof. I installed the fan on the west side of the kennel and tilted it slightly to get the air pointed towards the dogs. Fan is kinda small for the shroud but puts out a lot if air in full sun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but motor has a loud noise
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great but the motor makes a noise as it gets up to speed. When the sun is full bore on the solar panel it runs quiet but for the 2 hours leading up to full speed and for the 2 hours end of day it makes a rattle noise in the motor. It's installed and sealed into my house and it runs so I don't want to take it out but it's kinda annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N Spicijaric

customer_reviews.title: Small fan in big frame
customer_reviews.text: Warmth and sheerness? It's a fan not a bed sheet. About a 10 inch fan in 14 inch frame, low volume of air moved
customer_reviews.author: alwayslearning

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Fan works great, seller also provides great customer service. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: Took a minute to maneuver but once i figured out where to put it everything went smooth. It took about 2 hours to get 2 attic fans installed, which i thought it would've taken all day, and all systems are a go. 5 stars to customer service and definitely worth the purchases
customer_reviews.author: Eber G.

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best
customer_reviews.text: This fan is extremely small and moves very little air. It will barely open the louvres on the vent.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Dodds

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine. The sun has to be perpendicular to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine. The sun has to be perpendicular to the panel for it to work at full speed. Solar panel quality is great. Fan is good.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Martin

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: fans need to be isolated from solid frame work. at full speed they cause a vibration in the wall. panel is top line. lots of power to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my need, Blades could have been a little larger but for a 10'x12' Shed its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Fast install
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very easy to install.. had one question with wiring call mfg and got help .. works like a champ..
customer_reviews.author: Mark Navarrette

customer_reviews.title: Amtrak Solar's Powerful 40-Watt
customer_reviews.text: Product work fine, only thermostat doesn't work seen like defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never again!
customer_reviews.text: Well after a little over a year the unit did not work anymore. I checked connections, voltage developed from the solar panel (which was the proper amount), and the connections at the fan. Not having an independent separate power supply, I could not test the fan any further, but it was totally dead with not signs or smells of overheating, plus the wiring all continuity checked OK. So I'll salvage the solar panel for another project, and re-purpose the fan metal for some other project. Bottom line, I won't purchase nor recommend the purchase of one of these units.
customer_reviews.author: Boogy Bear

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for two months and now the motor start squeaking, it's getting louder. I was happy with the purchase unit now. I would give it a 5 stars if it wasn't for the noisy motor.
customer_reviews.author: B.L.M

customer_reviews.title: Attic fans
customer_reviews.text: I had these installed in my attic, they work great and move a lot of air. The seller was easy to work with. Very happy with price and value of product
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great if your trying to cool during the day
customer_reviews.text: Great if your trying to cool during the day. Even with panel dirty still worked good.
customer_reviews.author: MR G A MCLEOD

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and great tech support!
customer_reviews.text: What a GREAT product! We love this fan! Ron @ customer support was very quick to answer our electrical question! We actually installed the fan in our Greenhouse!
customer_reviews.author: Twiga

customer_reviews.title: A little louder than expected
customer_reviews.text: The solar panel is smaller than expected, the fan has a sticker on it that says 80 Watts when I selected the 40 watt fan. Connected it with a battery, solar charger controller, and a snap switch. Seems to work okay. But it also seems a little louder than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Ram from Amtrak Solar was most helpful in helping us get the right brackets for how we needed to mount the solar panel. He followed up both by email and by phone and promptly sent the brackets we needed. We were more than pleased with his attention to our situation.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: ... seems small out of the box but it works great!! Great price for a great product
customer_reviews.text: The fan seems small out of the box but it works great!! Great price for a great product! The temperature in my attic has not hit the highs it does in summer, so I will have to wait to find out how well this product does in the summer heat but by the way it runs in full sun now, I'm very confident it will get the job done in summer as well.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: The fan is keeping my 12x24 shed from becoming an oven.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Kindinger

customer_reviews.title: So far not really pleased.
customer_reviews.text: My greenhouse is no cooler after installing this fan. I bought this based on the reviews. Now going back I see that the reviews were for the 40 watt model. What the heck?
customer_reviews.author: Bev MCINIS

customer_reviews.title: No electricity usage all free operation
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can leave it run during the summer without chance of an electrical problems and no electricity usage,also I like the thermostat turns it on and of automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Dannyjoe53

customer_reviews.title: Works well for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The reviews I read about this product were spot on. The solar panel needs to have direct sunlight. If I had it to do over again, I would get the larger fan with the two 40W panels instead and angle the 2nd panel so the fan runs later into the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Foust

customer_reviews.title: Need free thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Would like to know how to get the free thermostat for this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Hagee

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product! I installed the fan, in the gable, above my wife's home office. She cannot hear any fan noise from it. I have a tile roof and could not install the solar on it. I was able to repurpose an old satellite dish mounting bracket and install it to the eaves easily. This is a great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Like: easy to understand and install. Dislike: didn't last a year... fan has already burned up and stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fast motor not too loud
customer_reviews.text: Works grate would have like it to work on lot less light but on the sun it's good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price was right and I would do it again if I need to
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job of cooling the attic so AC does not over heat
customer_reviews.author: Frank Berens

customer_reviews.title: Solar panel works
customer_reviews.text: This company is great. They are very helpful. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The system works as advertised. It only works with full sun, but was easy to install and I didn't have any concerns
customer_reviews.author: sports kid

customer_reviews.title: May work for an eight by 10 shed.
customer_reviews.text: CFI is a joke. Like a small battery powered personal fan; using Florida sun power. Fan mounting brackets too short.
customer_reviews.author: Chucky Cheese

customer_reviews.title: Not quite
customer_reviews.text: Claims to be quite but it can be heard clearly from the attack into the room below. It does move a lot of air. Had it for about 2 years. Still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish the fan had a little more air flow
customer_reviews.text: The system works but not as good as I wanted it to.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S.

customer_reviews.title: Tighten the fan bolt... they won’t
customer_reviews.text: Cheesy weld and so not circular. Just tried it and cheese ball factory worker did not tighten the fan blade bolt so it just spun off and shot pieces everywhere. I’m so excited to tear it all apart to fix it. So much for inspection
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: worked right out of the box.  Whether or not it's making a difference? tbd...
customer_reviews.text: this thing has been running hard since i put it in. Nice to hear it working--no clue if it's making a difference in attic temps. Too lazy to do an analysis, but i'm sure it must be helping. When on the roof, and placing my hand above a static air vent, versus the vent i placed this fan under, the fan vent was pumping out a ton more air.
customer_reviews.author: Kevan D. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Had to re drill holes for brackets on ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Had to re drill holes for brackets on solar panel so the bolt head can clear the side of frame. Would be nice if the panel had a tilt control.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for my application, Refund given as requested.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The other one i ordered does much much better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity
customer_reviews.text: Easy install ... this thing work s overtime/ Direct sun
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Fan blades fell off after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 7 months. The blade came off motor. Have no way to get it back on. Everything else works just fine but with out can does not move air. Trying to reach stellar solar for replacement. If they do right i will change to 5 stars. ***UPDATE-- I contacted Amtrak Solar and they responded Very Quickly. They are sending me a new motor and blade. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: D. E.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Put this in storage shed. Works like a champ.a/c would have been perfect but this makes it usable in az summer. Would have given 5 stars only had problem with connector wire
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install, great product!
customer_reviews.text: I only had it on for one day and it’s already full of bugs, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Revalee

customer_reviews.title: Not enough air movement
customer_reviews.text: This was put into our 10 x 10 greenhouse and it does not move enough air to open the luvers that I purchased with it. I have to use wood blocks to prop them open
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This totally ventilates the work shop, I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.author: mfunyane

customer_reviews.title: Fan is quite small and did not move the air it advertises.
customer_reviews.text: Product was very noisy. Shook the house! Eventually the fan blade just wobbled off.
customer_reviews.author: richard luke farnam

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: both the fan and the solar panel were simple to install.
customer_reviews.author: johnjanedoe

product_meta.title: Amtrak Solar's Powerful 40-Watt Galvanized Steel New Upgraded14" Solar Attic Fan Quietly Cools and Ventilates your house, garage or RV and protects against moisture build-up.
feature_bullets: New 14 inch Fan Housing with 10" High Efficiency fan blade. enough to open louver. Easy to install with quick-connect wires.
For Gabel vent, greenhouse, garage or RV. Includes 15’ of extra wire and brackets.
Thermal protected fan motor with high efficiency fan blades. For areas up to 2250 Sq. Ft.
40 watt Solar Panel. Free optional thermostat upon request.
